description: Rear-wheel drive class D sedan. The premiere show of the car took place at the Geneva Motor Show on March 6, 2018.
overview: If you really look closely, then you still have a chance to learn that we have a restyled version of the W205 model. At the front, the changes are a slightly corrected design of the head optics (LED is already in the base), as well as the front bumper - with a large air intake area in the middle and smaller cells on the sides. The changes in the rear also concern the lanterns - in this version, the drawing resembles a mirrored letter C. In addition, the rear bumper has been tweaked in the air outlets, and the shape of the exhaust pipes has been slightly changed. But there are other versions: for example, the EXCLUSIVE version with a radiator grille with three crossbars and a complete air intake area in the front bumper resembles the S-Class. The AMG-Line version can be recognized by the diamond grille and the front bumper cross bars.

specifications.hint: Engine capacity refers to the volume swept by all the pistons of an engine, within their bores, from the top to the bottom of their travel.

specifications.name: Horse power(hp):
specifications.hint: Horsepower (hp) is a unit of measurement of power, or the rate at which work is done, usually in reference to the output of engines or motors.

specifications.name: Torque(Nm):
specifications.hint: Torque is a twisting force that speaks to the engine's rotational force and measures how much of that twisting force is available when an engine exerts itself.
